name: Earth Invaders (りﾑ刀)
description:
Welcome to Earth Invaders

This game is an homage to Space Invaders for its’ 40th anniversary.

It is very simple to play. Use the arrow keys or A and D to move the character horizontally. Your character is clamped down so you cannot move vertically.
To pause the game, press the ESC key.

Your objective is to stay alive and survive the incoming swarm of enemies, such as:

Fig 1. Protector, Soldier and Commander

Each enemy has its’ own shooting pattern and features but I’ll leave that to you to figure out!

Press space to shoot the enemies and kill them! Once you’ve killed them all, you’ll
be teleported to the next level. For now, you gotta beat two levels to win the game.      

ENJOY!
